recipesJson.name: Red Dragon Cartel
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: Ry4  tobacco caramel vanilla custard..... with winter coming soon I'm stocking up on my favorite ADV..mix it try it love it... just a side note version #2 I added 1.5% Graham cracker Clear TPA

reviews.text: Tried it without TFA Graham Cracker Clear and after a week of steep it's very very good. Simple yet very satisfying! ADV without a doubt, awesome work!
